author: jemenger
content: I wrote an article about checksumming a dapp like the Launchpad. This is not released widely yet so please give me some feedback, especially if you think this won't work very well. https://jpitts.medium.com/how-to-checksum-a-dapp-e865d952310c

author: protolambda
content: If you can link to a gist with the actual contents between the pipes in the final command, that would be nice for context. To read what the summary actually looks like, instead of just straight from input URL to output checksum

author: jemenger
content: Oh that is a good one!

author: protolambda
content: Also, if the summary contains relative paths, it may be reproducible with a local clone.

author: jemenger
content: Thx, y will definitely keep trying to get to that, reproducing the result from git commit is ideal.
